error_handling_prompts.title: File Not Found Error Handling
error_handling_prompts.prompt: Write a Python function that reads a file and returns its content. Ensure the function handles file not found errors gracefully.

error_handling_prompts.title: Division by Zero Error Handling
error_handling_prompts.prompt: Write a Python function that divides two numbers and handles division by zero errors gracefully.

error_handling_prompts.title: Type Error Handling
error_handling_prompts.prompt: Write a Python function that adds two numbers and handles type errors gracefully if the inputs are not numbers.

error_handling_prompts.title: Index Error Handling
error_handling_prompts.prompt: Write a Python function that accesses an element in a list by index and handles index errors gracefully.

error_handling_prompts.title: Key Error Handling
error_handling_prompts.prompt: Write a Python function that accesses a value in a dictionary by key and handles key errors gracefully.
